page.title: 01NW Fringe Bury St Edmunds
page.content: Area included in this block lies on the North Western Boundary of Bury St Edmunds and includes the village of Fornham All Saints Hengrave and part of Flempton which are now basically dormitories of Bury St Edmunds and Thetford. it also includes a part of the valley of the non navigatable river Lark. Away from the river the land is mainly arable with a certain amount of aforestation .Where farming is carried on it is mainly on large holdings. In the village of Hengrave is Hengrave Hall set in large grounds with a lake and tennis courts. It is now used as a christian retreat and conference centre managed by catholic nuns and volunteer helpers used by all denominations of the christian faith as a retreat and by organisation for functions and conferences either residential or one day.
